title: Maus0728
author: Maus0728
content: Heya! Just want to introduce this website full of masterclass courses that could somehow help you upskill kapag may free time kayo. For now uploaded lang siya sa google drive and these masterclasses comprises of file format in mkv and pdf, so expect na may videos and manuals.Nag request na din ako ng content about cryptocurrency in general so hintay hintay na lang.Here it is.[1] https://jeremy-layson.github.io/

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Waiting for more topics about cryptocurrency, hilig ko magbasa-basa and maybe this can be a big help to others as well so thank you for sharing this. Sana magkaroon pa tayo ng nga ganitong compilation na kung saan matututo talaga tayo and not just about a marketing strategy kase sa online, puro endorsement naman ang kanilang mga pinopost and hinde naman talaga aim to help people.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: @crzyWelcome. May mga bagong courses na kaka upload lang kahapon, majority non mga course about tech and some other employable skills na pwedeng magamit sa ibat-ibang industry, so check it out.May facebook page din yan para updated kayo.- https://www.facebook.com/salphalp?mibextid=ZbWKwL

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Starting to follow their facebook page and mukang interesting ito to see their willingness to guide and help. Matagal na ako naghahanap ng magandang course about excel, tamang tama ito sa akin and maganda yung layunin nila. Sana magkaroon den sila ng more topics about crypto, especially about minting at iba pa.

comments.author: karmamiu
comments.body: Idadadag-dag ko to sa watchlist ko. Sa panahon ngayon andaming naglipana na mga online free courses pero ang malaking problema ang karamihan is medyo fishy at parang naging referral system lang dinÂ  . Nakakalungkot lang na gusto mo sanang magbasa at matuto kaso kahit sa mga libreng content na lang andaming ganyan, pahirapan sa paghahanap ng safe na mga courses at mga site na matututo ka.

comments.author: SushiMonster
comments.body: Ang galing na meron ganito na nag bibigay ng libreng courses. Dinodownload niya lang siguro yan tapos collect no?Salamat sa pag share nito OP!

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Quote from: SushiMonster on February 16, 2023, 02:02:10 AMDinodownload niya lang siguro yan tapos collect no?Dinownload niya yan sa physical hard drive for backup tapos inupload niya sa gdrive so anyone who has the link can access. Kung makikita mo lahat ng content naka zip para kapag inupload mag shrink yung size and hindi mabigat doon sa magdownload.So kung nag-aalala ka kung may virus, well nauna nang dumaan yan sa pc niya saka naverify na rin niya in the first place kung meron bago niya iupload.

comments.author: SushiMonster
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on February 17, 2023, 10:33:17 AMQuote from: SushiMonster on February 16, 2023, 02:02:10 AMDinodownload niya lang siguro yan tapos collect no?Dinownload niya yan sa physical hard drive for backup tapos inupload niya sa gdrive so anyone who has the link can access. Kung makikita mo lahat ng content naka zip para kapag inupload mag shrink yung size and hindi mabigat doon sa magdownload.So kung nag-aalala ka kung may virus, well nauna nang dumaan yan sa pc niya saka naverify na rin niya in the first place kung meron bago niya iupload.Salamat sa pag sagot nito OP. Hindi naman ako worried at nasubukan ko na idownload at nakanood na din ako kahit papano ng binigay mo. The Advanced SEO strategies. Interested kasi ako mag setup ng website para sa businesses ko. Para mapadami yung aking visitors ng site.
